zh-cn: 衣索比亚联邦民主共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于非洲之角的主权国家，是全球人口最多的内陆国家，亦为人口第二多的非洲国家。
description.en: A sovereign state in the Horn of Africa, it is the world's most populous landlocked country and the second-most populous country in Africa.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚帝国的末代皇帝，在位期间被意大利入侵而流亡，二战后复位，最终于1974年被军事政变推翻。
description.en: The last emperor of the Ethiopian Empire, he was exiled during the Italian invasion, restored to the throne after World War II, and was eventually overthrown by a military coup in 1974.

nodes.id: 门格斯图·海尔·马里亚姆

zh-cn: 门格斯图·海尔·马里亚姆

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚军官和政治家，领导“德尔格”军政府，在1977年至1991年间统治埃塞俄比亚。
description.en: An Ethiopian soldier and politician who was the leader of the Derg military junta that ruled Ethiopia from 1977 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚政治家，自2018年起担任埃塞俄比亚总理。他因结束与邻国厄立特里亚长达20年的战争而获得2019年诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: An Ethiopian politician serving as the Prime Minister of Ethiopia since 2018. He was awarded the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize for his work in ending the 20-year-long war with neighboring Eritrea.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚政治家，曾任埃塞俄比亚过渡政府总统，后长期担任总理直至去世。
description.en: An Ethiopian politician who served as President of the Transitional Government of Ethiopia and later as Prime Minister until his death.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚政治家，现任埃塞俄比亚总统。
description.en: An Ethiopian politician, the current President of Ethiopia.

description.zh-cn: 由所罗门王朝统治的东非古代帝国，是少数未被欧洲殖民的非洲国家之一。
description.en: An ancient East African empire ruled by the Solomonic dynasty, one of the few African countries not colonized by Europeans.

description.zh-cn: 1974年推翻埃塞俄比亚帝国后成立的军事政府，由门格斯图领导。
description.en: The military junta that ruled Ethiopia after overthrowing the Ethiopian Empire in 1974, led by Mengistu Haile Mariam.

nodes.id: 埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线

zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚的一个政治联盟，于1991年推翻德尔格政权后长期执政，后改组为繁荣党。
description.en: A political coalition in Ethiopia that ruled the country after overthrowing the Derg regime in 1991, later reorganized into the Prosperity Party.

description.zh-cn: 由埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线改组而成的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party in Ethiopia, formed from the reorganization of the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front.

description.zh-cn: 位于非洲之角的国家，曾与埃塞俄比亚组成联邦，后于1993年独立。
description.en: A country in the Horn of Africa, formerly in a federation with Ethiopia, which became independent in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚提格雷州的政党和前叛乱组织，曾是埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线的核心力量，后与联邦政府爆发提格雷战争。
description.en: A political party and former rebel group in the Tigray Region of Ethiopia. It was the core of the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front and later engaged in the Tigray War against the federal government.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪末至20世纪初对埃塞俄比亚进行殖民侵略的欧洲国家。
description.en: A European state that engaged in colonial aggression against Ethiopia in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.

description.zh-cn: 二战后大力扶持埃塞俄比亚帝国的世界大国。
description.en: A world power that strongly supported the Ethiopian Empire after World War II.

description.zh-cn: 冷战期间支持埃塞俄比亚德尔格军政府的超级大国。
description.en: A superpower that supported the Derg military junta in Ethiopia during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 一场推翻埃塞俄比亚末代皇帝海尔·塞拉西一世的军事政变，导致德尔格军政府上台。
description.en: A military coup that overthrew the last Ethiopian emperor, Haile Selassie I, leading to the rise of the Derg military junta.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚联邦政府与提格雷人民解放阵线之间爆发的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict between the federal government of Ethiopia and the Tigray People's Liberation Front.

nodes.id: 第一次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争

zh-cn: 第一次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争
第一次意大利衣索比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 意大利王国对埃塞俄比亚帝国的侵略战争，以埃塞俄比亚获胜、维护国家独立告终。
description.en: A war of aggression by the Kingdom of Italy against the Ethiopian Empire, which ended with an Ethiopian victory, preserving the country's independence.

nodes.id: 第二次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争

zh-cn: 第二次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争
第二次意大利衣索比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 由墨索里尼策动的侵略战争，导致埃塞俄比亚被意大利占领。
description.en: A war of aggression initiated by Mussolini, which resulted in the Italian occupation of Ethiopia.

description.zh-cn: 德尔格军政府与多个反政府武装组织之间的长期冲突，最终导致德尔格政权被推翻。
description.en: A prolonged conflict between the Derg military junta and various anti-government armed groups, which ultimately led to the overthrow of the Derg regime.

description.zh-cn: 厄立特里亚为争取脱离埃塞俄比亚独立而进行的长期武装斗争。
description.en: A long armed struggle fought by Eritreans for independence from Ethiopia.

nodes.id: 埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚联邦

zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚联邦

description.zh-cn: 根据联合国决议成立的联邦国家，将前意大利殖民地厄立特里亚与埃塞俄比亚帝国联合起来。
description.en: A federal state established by a UN resolution, uniting the former Italian colony of Eritrea with the Ethiopian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战东非战场击败意大利，并帮助海尔·塞拉西一世复位的国家。
description.en: The country that defeated Italy in the East African theatre of World War II and helped restore Haile Selassie I to power.

description.zh-cn: 由巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国、南非、埃及、埃塞俄比亚、伊朗和阿联酋组成的新兴市场国家合作机制。
description.en: A cooperation mechanism of emerging market countries comprising Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa, Egypt, Ethiopia, Iran, and the United Arab Emirates.

description.zh-cn: 在德尔格政权被推翻后，由埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线组建的临时政府。
description.en: The provisional government established by the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front after the overthrow of the Derg regime.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争中，埃塞俄比亚帝国击败意大利王国，维护了其主权独立。
description.en: In the First Italo-Ethiopian War, the Ethiopian Empire defeated the Kingdom of Italy, preserving its sovereign independence.

relationships.source: 第二次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 第二次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争导致埃塞俄比亚被意大利占领并吞并。
description.en: The Second Italo-Ethiopian War resulted in Ethiopia being occupied and annexed by Italy.

relationships.source: 第二次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 由于第二次意大利埃塞俄比亚战争，时任皇帝海尔·塞拉西一世被迫流亡英国。
description.en: Due to the Second Italo-Ethiopian War, the reigning emperor Haile Selassie I was forced into exile in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 1941年，英军在二战东非战场击败意大利后，帮助海尔·塞拉西一世回到首都复位。
description.en: In 1941, after defeating Italy in the East African theatre of World War II, British forces helped Haile Selassie I return to the capital and resume his throne.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，美国大力扶持埃塞俄比亚帝国，提供了大量军事和经济援助。
description.en: After World War II, the United States strongly supported the Ethiopian Empire, providing substantial military and economic aid.

description.zh-cn: 1962年，海尔·塞拉西一世宣布解散厄立特里亚议会，将其强行改为埃塞俄比亚的一个省，此举剥夺了厄立特里亚的自治权并引发了独立战争。
description.en: In 1962, Haile Selassie I announced the dissolution of the Eritrean parliament and forcibly turned it into a province of Ethiopia, an act that stripped Eritrea of its autonomy and sparked the war for independence.

description.zh-cn: 1974年的军事政变推翻了皇帝海尔·塞拉西一世的统治。
description.en: The 1974 military coup overthrew the rule of Emperor Haile Selassie I.

description.zh-cn: 1974年的军事政变导致德尔格军政府建立并上台执政。
description.en: The 1974 military coup led to the establishment and rise to power of the Derg military junta.

relationships.source: 门格斯图·海尔·马里亚姆

description.zh-cn: 门格斯图是德尔格军政府的实际掌权者和领导人。
description.en: Mengistu was the de facto ruler and leader of the Derg military junta.

description.zh-cn: 在埃塞俄比亚内战中，德尔格政权转向苏联阵营，并获得了大量苏联援助。
description.en: During the Ethiopian Civil War, the Derg regime turned to the Soviet bloc and received substantial Soviet aid.

relationships.source: 埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线

description.zh-cn: 1991年5月28日，埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线的武装力量推翻了门格斯图领导的德尔格政权。
description.en: On May 28, 1991, the armed forces of the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front overthrew the Derg regime led by Mengistu.

relationships.source: 埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线

description.zh-cn: 2019年，执政联盟埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线改组为单一政党繁荣党。
description.en: In 2019, the ruling coalition Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front was reorganized into a single party, the Prosperity Party.

description.zh-cn: 1998年至2000年间，埃塞俄比亚与厄立特里亚因边界争端爆发了战争。
description.en: Between 1998 and 2000, Ethiopia and Eritrea fought a war over a border dispute.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，埃塞俄比亚总理阿比·艾哈迈德与厄立特里亚达成和解，宣布结束两国长达数十年的敌对状态。
description.en: In 2018, Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed reached a reconciliation with Eritrea, declaring an end to the decades-long state of hostility between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 自2020年11月起，埃塞俄比亚联邦政府与提格雷人民解放阵线之间爆发了提格雷战争。
description.en: Since November 2020, the Tigray War broke out between the Ethiopian federal government and the Tigray People's Liberation Front.

description.zh-cn: 阿比·艾哈迈德自2018年起担任埃塞俄比亚总理。
description.en: Abiy Ahmed has served as the Prime Minister of Ethiopia since 2018.

description.zh-cn: 塔耶·阿茨克·塞拉西是埃塞俄比亚现任总统。
description.en: Taye Atske Selassie is the current President of Ethiopia.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚于2024年成为金砖国家正式成员。
description.en: Ethiopia became a full member of BRICS in 2024.

relationships.target: 埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚联邦
埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚联邦
